      • schedule

        public void schedule(int delay,
                     int period,
                     Function1<? super error.NonExistentClass,Unit> task)

        Schedules a tick task

        Parameters:
        delay - the number of ticks to wait before starting (0 is instant)
        period - how often to repeat the task until stopped (0 doesn't repeat)
        task - the task to run
